text: Kerry E. Roberts is a Republican politician and radio personality. He is a member of the Tennessee Senate for the 25th district since 2015. From 2011 to 2013, he represented the 18th district. In January 2020, Roberts left his weekly radio show on Springfield's WDBL and moved to Nashville's WLAC. He was born in Bedford, Indiana. Roberts was hospitalized in October 2020 in Nashville, Tennessee after having an aneurysm. ==References== Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American radio personalities Category:Entertainers from Tennessee Category:Entertainers from Indiana Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:1961 births Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Kerry Roberts
